feed.title: Florent Ygouf
feed.subtitle: Welcome to my webpage! You can find here some information about my research and teaching activities and some other stuffs.

entry.title: A new webpage!
entry.content: Welcome to my new website! I built it using Jekyll with the Minima theme. It took some time to get the hang of it, but now updating and managing the site will be much more enjoyable. If you’d like to learn more about Jekyll, check out this link.
entry.summary: Welcome to my new website! I built it using Jekyll with the Minima theme. It took some time to get the hang of it, but now updating and managing the site will be much more enjoyable. If you’d like to learn more about Jekyll, check out this link.
